mapper.delete: delete from inpatient where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into inpatient ( org_code, inpat_form_no, patient_id, visit_org_name, visit_dept_name, visit_dtime, resp_doctor_name, last_update_dtime ) values( #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{respDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update inpatient set org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inpat_form_no = #{inpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_org_name = #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_dept_name = #{visitDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_dtime = #{visitDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, resp_doctor_name = #{respDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
